query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS roles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2Uyd3Liwh3sGsMt.root --database 6uNros3Y2qtXxTtyi8V5g7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS roles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
